product_name: Maui Jim Peahi Polarized Sunglasses - Black - Men's
long_description: Like the bay they were named for, the Maui Jim Peahi sunglasses boost colors in a big way, shading your eyes from the sun's harmful rays and reducing glare from water, sand and snow. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Maui Jim PolarizedPlus2(R)2 technology blocks glare and UV rays from all angles; manages harmful blue light and boosts colors for clarity and contrast. Frames are lightweight and hypoallergenic. Anti-corrosive nickel/silver alloy hinges enhance durability. Lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely impact resistant. Frame shape is ideal for oval, round, square, pear and diamond face shapes. Lenses and frames are treated for use in saltwater. Built-in silicone nose pads prevent slippage. Includes a protective case and cleaning cloth. Matte black rubber frames feature bronze lenses that offer excellent contrast and optimize visibility in low light; they provide subtle bronze hue for everyday wear.
short_description: Like the bay they were named for, the Maui Jim Peahi sunglasses boost colors in a big way, shading your eyes from the sun's harmful rays and reducing glare from water, sand and snow.
